courseName: Cognitive Behavioural Psychotherapy: Adult or Children and Young people (MSc)
facultyName: College of Health, Psychology and Social Care
description: Our aim is to help you to become a skilled, independent cognitive behavioural psychotherapist. If you’re a caring professional who would like to develop expertise in evidence-based psychotherapy, CBT is for you.
duration: 2 years full time, 3 years part time
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
